name: Fear of the Dice
description:
Fear of the Dice is a retro first person shooter made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Hope you (are somehow able to) enjoy it!

Background:

Your received an unexpected letter signed by your best friend. He wants to show you something at the park where both of you spent most of your childhood at.

Controls:

  • Walk with WASD
  • Jump with SPACE
  • Shoot with LeftClick
  • Throw dice with RightClick

Game-play:

  • Your bullets might be infinite, but every shot can spawn another enemy.
  • Throw a Haunted Die into the air and shoot it when you see it get lighten by The Moon to damage multiple enemies.
  • Shoot it at the wrong time or let it touch the ground if you want to get hurt.
